lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Careful upgraded to Level 2.

Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.
Workaholic upgraded to Level 2.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Careful upgraded to Level 3.

Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.
Workaholic upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Careful upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name:
Airshow
大空の舞
text: When [Airstrike] hits a target, if the number of ships alive on enemy fleet is equal or less than 4, obtains a [Special Airstrike] that deals 60% damage. If used or not used within 5 seconds, this skill is disabled for the rest of the battle. 2. If either Enterprise or Hornet is present in the same battle, boost [Special Airstrike] damage by 10%. If both are present, boost by 20% instead.Can only proc once per battle.

skills.name:
Careful Preparation
準備万端
text: After ending a battle, boost damage by 5%, stacks up to 3 times. 2. In map mode, a successful [Pre-emptive Airstrike] increases damage in next battle by 15%.

skills.name:
Unyielding Willpower
不屈の意志
text: During [Battle], if Medium or Heavy damaged, repairs 50% of Max HP over 3 seconds

When Medium or Heavy damaged during [Day Battle], obtains a special [Airstrike] that deals 75% damage. If not used within 10 seconds, this skill will disappear, [Airstrike] CD will not be affected. Can only activate once per battle

comment: A real workaholic. Has superhuman multitasking ability, but is always buried in a mountain of paperwork so she is perpetually working overtime. Cat-lover.
